<img src="http://errantweb.com/images/logo.png" />  

ErrantWeb has been providing hosting services out of Troy, MI since January of 2012, we've continued working with our customers to continue bringing out great products for you guys. We are now launching our San Diego location and in this launch we're making a amazing special. Take a look below at our 128MB plan for San Diego, it's super affordable and a great virtual server for the money!
